author: stsp
msg: not all operating systems people use have kernel threads these days,
<gstein> stsp: patch it, man. but I'm still registering my complaint
Also adjust a comment which implied that sqlite's shared cache only

author: stsp
msg: * STATUS: Vote for the entire r38000 group.

author: rhuijben
msg: (prep_directory): Just open an access baton to the directory if we don't
have one already. The shared db will handle the other cases.

author: hwright
msg: Print a newline before the plaintext password prompt.
It wasn't intentional that the first line of dashes of this prompt
appears on the same line as "Transmitting file data ..." during commit.

author: hwright
msg: Fix 2 failing tests in ruby bindings.
1.6.5 shipped with these failures by accident. Failing regression tests
can confuse packagers or other people who want to verify their freshly
compiled binaries using our regression test suite.
